item.title: Some Trick
item.description: Some Trick Description: Bob and Alice found a futuristic version of opunssl and replaced all their needs for doofy wellmen. Introduction Some Trick was the first cryptography challenge in the 2024 edition of SekaiCTF. The challenge implements a key exchange based on a set of permutations and asks us to retrieve the flag that was used as a key in Bob’s first encryption. import random from secrets import randbelow, randbits from flag import FLAG CIPHER_SUITE = randbelow(2**256) print(f"oPUN_SASS_SASS_l version 4.
